description: A thin layer over react-motion for animating routes in react-router.
name: react-router-transition

scripts.gh-pages: git b -D gh-pages && git co -b gh-pages && (cd example && npm run build) && cp example/{index.html,bundle.js} ./ && cp index.html 404.html && git add . && git commit -m 'gh-pages' && git push origin gh-pages --force
